venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
DO NOT DOUBLE RSVP! ----PLEASE RSVP IN ONE GROUP ONLY!!

Time for another Mix +Mingle cross Meetup Private Party for up to 200 members! This will be to Celebrate our 5 year Anniversary and for that I wanted to do something Extremely Special for all my wonderful friends! We have moved to a much better spot called the WILD ROVER (at the edge of  Faneuil Hall) at 61 Chatham St Boston, MA. Its at the corners of Commercial and Chatham ST next to the Hong Kong Restaurant.

Website: http://www.wildroverboston.com/ ----- Tel (857) 263-8715

WILD ROVER 2nd floor holds about 200 people. We’ll have our own DJ, dance floor, bathrooms, appetizers, bar area, etc. We have arranged an open buffet of apps and food from 7PM till 10PM of the following: Chicken and Buffalo fingers, beef teriyaki, stuffed mushrooms, pizza with toppings, cheese and cheese quesadillas, vegetable trays with veggie dip, cheese and crackers, ETC....so enjoy some great food while it lasts.

Note: Background music will be at low levels upstairs from 7 to 9PM so members will have a  quite time to chat. After 9PM the dancing + loud music starts. Please do not complain, since members come to dance to music after 9PM.

They will have free KARAOKE on their main stage on the first floor for us as well if you want to kick it KARAOKE style all night long!!!

*******************************************************************

Now the best part!!!...If you come in between 7 and 8PMyou will get 2 free drink tickets good for any beer, any wine, and lots of mixed drinks! (Sorry no shots or top-shelf liquor i.e., Patron, etc.). Drink tickets will expire at 8:30PMsharp!!

When you get there just head upstairs, (please do not block the stairway) there will be a private party sign up. Then meet/greet Biagio or  ALEX (the person with colored wrist bands).  Please clearly say your first name,  what group you are with, and pay with a $10 bill in hand at the top of the stairs (no $1 bills, please). We will be giving you a colored wrist bands to mark who is already in so you can go upstairs and downstairs.

I (Biagio) have hired a person (ALEX) to collect money so I can for talk to all our  wonderful members and spend time with my girlfriend too! :-P

1. Everyone, but the invited Meetup Group Head Organizers, pays $10 cash.

2. After 9 p.m. you will have to pay another cover charge to the bar, so stretch your dollar and come before 9PM.  If you get in before 9PM you ONLY have to pay $10 to Biagio.

3. If you come after 8PM you might not get in right away and you will have to wait downstairs with the waitlisters. This always happens so its another reason to come early!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Invited Meetup Groups are:

Social Fun http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun (Confirmed by Biagio)

Girls just want to have FUN http://www.meetup.com/FUNgirls/ (Confirmed by Sarah)

Fun with Alcohol http://www.meetup.com/fun-with-alcohol/events/55264212/ (Confirmed by Dave)

The New to Boston Meetup Group 20's - early 30's http://www.meetup.com/The-New-to-Boston-Meetup-Group/ (Confirmed by Lauren)

BostonSingles: http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles/ (Confirmed by Matt)

Singles Geeks, Nerds and Professional: (Confirmed by Alison) http://www.meetup.com/Professional-Geeky-Singles/

BostonVolunteers -Boston's most popular volunteer Meetup http://www.meetup.com/bigenoughtodeliver/ (confirmed by Josh)

Looking to add 2-3 more groups so let me know soon!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We normally have 220 members at these Mix and Mingle parties. I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party. It should be fun so thanks and enjoy life!
item.name: Mix +Mingle cross Meetup Private Party for up to 200 members!
